name: Jump The Saw
description:
In this addicting one-touch mobile game, tap to jump over the spinning saw blade. Things may seem easy at first, but don't be fooled, this saw blade is tricky. It will employ a number of movement patterns to throw your timing off so it can hit you. How long can you survive?

Collect coins and purchase various skins for your character in the shop!

Good luck, have fun!
